text: qabar daar! tum wo log ho, ke Allah ki raah mein qarch karne ke liye bulaaye jaate ho, to tum mein se baaz baqili karne lagte hai aur jo buql karta hai, wo to dar asl apni jaan se baqili karta hai, Allah taâ€™ala ghani hai aur tum faqeer (aur muhtaaj) ho, aur agar tum ru gardaa ho jaao to wo tumhaare badhle tumhaare siva aur logo ko layega jo phir tum jaise na honge
